2004 год.Вышла Counter-Strike:Sourse.Клубы были просто переполнены и сесть за компьютер и погонять в CSS это было целым достижением.И я будучи мелким просаживал в клубах больше денег чем вы себе представляете,и все ради чего как вы думаете?Естественно что бы поиграть с друзьями в CSS .Эта игра сделала мое детсво и навсегда останется в моем сердце

Отличная игра. 
Counter-Strike: Source - это римейк обычного Counter-Strike, выполненный на движке от Half-Life 2. Помимо улучшенного движка, полной поддержки Steamworks и пользовательских карт разработчики так же добавили в игру достижения, несколько изменили баланс и усовершенствовали графическую составляющую, причем дважды. В 2010 году с очередным обновлением графики игра так же стала поддерживать Mac OS, новые экраны статистики и общей информации, новое отображение окончания раунда с интересными фактами об игроке, новую кинематографическую камеру смерти и 145 новых достижений.

首先，本人是通过玩盗版才认识这游戏，后来玩steam时入手的正版。毕竟承载着我童年的快乐，所以这个游戏个人认为非常好。
但是（事情坏就坏在这两个字的手上），强烈建议官方能继续关注一下这个游戏，至少增加创意工坊的功能吧,例如加入地图，武器，角色之类的，毕竟要对得起68CNY这个价嘛。。。

A pure classic. I remember playing this at school whenever we had a substitute teacher and never had a dull moment. 

So when i saw this game on sale, i just had to buy. To my plesent suprise, the game is still great and it's good to see there's still an active community after all these years, which is always a great thing. In my personal oppinion, i think this game is loads better then the latest game in the series (Counter Strike: Global offensive). In short, this game is pure fun and still has a dedicated and competative community. What more can you want from a 12 year old game!
经典啊！

这是一款很不错的fsp游戏。无论光影效果，模型纹理，物理引擎，水面反射，后坐力，枪声，画质等方面即使拿到今天仍然不会感到这款游戏有一种落伍的感觉。游戏细节革新却仍然耐玩。可以说它是让我玩了时间最长的一个游戏。百玩不腻。但是作为好换模型的我觉得美中不足的是大部分hud及杀敌音效装载后不显示。
嗯。。。04年的游戏

[h1]WARNING: LONG REVIEW.[/h1]
Counter Strike: Source is quite possibly the Best and one of the earliest Games that i purchased here on steam. It's basically like the original Counter Strike but with the power of the source engine to revamp the game to give it some Pros, and quite many points of negativities.

First, lets start with the weapons. Like the Original CS 1.6, the Recoil is quite the same as from CSS. The difference i noticed that the original Deagle in CS 1.6 Takes 2 shots to shoot perfectly where the crosshair is pointed as-is. But in CSS, deagle takes only 1 shot to shoot perfectly. Next shots (2- 7 shots) will make it inaccurate. I like this feauture. But it's so overpowered i get fragged at T-Spawn in de_dust2 by only one shot with the Deagle. At the first round. So it's 50-50% that i hate/love this feature. AK-47 fires the same as in CS 1.6, no problem with that.

Ah, yes. The Source Engine™. How could i forget. Half-Life 2's revoloutionary Source engine, combined with CS 1.6 is quite amazing. Better graphics, features, ect etc etc etc. It somehow amazing, the VALVeh1]WARNING: LONG REVIEW.[/h1]
Counter Strike: Source is quite possibly the Best and one of the earliest Games that i purchased here on steam. It's basically like the original Counter Strike but with the power of the source engine to revamp the game to gie it some Pros, and quite many points of negativities.

First, lets start with the weapons. Like the Original CS 1.6, the Recoil is quite the same as from CSS. The difference i noticed that the original Deagle in CS 1.6 Takes 2 shots to shoot perfectly where the crosshair is pointed as-is. But in CSS, deagle takes only 1 shot to shoot perfectly. Next shots (2- 7 shots) will make it inaccurate. I like this feauture. But it's so overpowered i get fragged at T-Spawn in de_dust2 by only one shot with the Deagle. At the first round. So it's 50-50% that i hate/love this feature. AK-47 fires the same as in CS 1.6, no problem with that.

Ah, yes. The Source Engine™. How could i forget. Half-Life 2's revoloutionary Source engine, combined with CS 1.6 is quite amazing. Better graphics, features, ect etc etc etc. It somehow amazing, the VALVe™ formula works.

Third, the Bots. Good thing VALVe™ Added Bots. Those bots are my best friends [spoilers]Or enemies[/spoilers] when there's no Intenet Connnection. Bad thing is, these bots seemed like the AI is ported over from CS;CZ, which sucks. Ally bot AI is catastrophic. Bots block your way when they get idle, this is worse when they do this at de_dust2's Suicide path. And it makes you go to path Outside Long just to get to Mid/catwalk because Bots block your way. And that sucks ALOT. 

TL;DR:

Recoil with deagle:
[table]
   [tr]
[th]CS1.6[/th]
[th]CSS[/th]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td]2 Shots to be accurate[/td]
[td]1 shot to be accurate[/td]
[/tr]
[/table]

Nonetheless, i still Like CSS. It's infact one of the reasons Steam™ is getting bigger than it was the other day.


7/10

A fun FPS that i would reccomend when its on sale.The community has mostly moved over to CS:GO but there are still people playing the original counter strike so there are still people playing this one.If you like fast paced FPS then go play COD (Call Of Duty) this is a team based FPS and does require a lot of practice to win against the people who still play.Anyway,this game has not and will not be updated anymore.CS:GO is much more lively but does not use the source physics engine, so Mr Great Ideas,no you cannot hide a bomb under a barrel in CS:GO but you can in source physics engine in CS:S (Counter Strike:Source).I miss the old physics engine :(  .

Overall i would give this game 7/10 because of the small community and oudated graphics.It would be 6/10 if there was no nostalga and 5 if there was no cool physics engine.

I hope this review helped anyone who didn't know what the game is about and i hope you enjoy the game if you are going to play it.

Yours hopefully,Nice One/zenthree    


(.P.S. plz dont critisize me if there is any spelling errors or any thing that is inncorrect because it would take me ages to find one becuase of the long review.)

posted this review in July 2016,3 years later , and all i can say extra is that people still play this game 9/10 better than cs go in my opinion and the gun game and deathmatch is fast paced and cod is filled with campers so stay off there (personal experience with BO4 in xbox one) and the game is now reduced to £7.19, HL3 Hasn't came out yet but i still play this game every now and then.In conclusion, buy this game for nostalgia or just dumb fun with friends, or just to get the textures for Garry's mod its till worth it in 2019.Don't be stingey about graphics man, the gamplay made this game sell.

[h1][i]Данный обзор о CS:S по состоянию на 2016 г.[/i][/h1]

[i]ВНИМАНИЕ[/i] - обзор (если перечисление + и - можно так назвать) содержит в себе чуточку мата. Хотя игрокам CS к нему не привыкать, так что всё равно.

Маловероятно, что кто-нибудь будет это читать, так как обзоров куча, да и сама игра не нуждается в представлении. Но тем не менее, спустя 10 лет запустив игру вновь я стал свидетелем того, что там творится:

[u][b]Плюсы:[/b][/u]
 + На большинстве серверов стоит ограничение на количество AWP в команде что уже  само по себе плюс.
 + Всё ещё играет большое количество народа, найти паблик на свой цвет, вкус и пинг не составит труда.
 + Графон почти как в GO, нет наркоманских скинов, за которые каждый школьник готов отдать в сексуальное рабство свою мать.
 + Не получишь бан на 7 дней из-за инета/кошка рожает/мама выгоняет.

[u][b]Минусы:[/b][/u]
 - Куча "пацанских" и "отсoси у админа и получи VIP" пабликов, на которых играют всё те же  индивидумы с бухими рожами/адидасами/прочей пацанской xуйнёй на аватарках и имеющие 0-10 лвл стима.
 - Паблики варьируются от вполне годных и оригинальных до жути с парашютами/рендж ножами/скинами Хацунэ Мику/цветным дымом и т.д.
 - Из за этого при заходе на сервер клиент качает ~100500 метров всякого гoвнa на комп (фиксится отключением в настройках закачки доп. контента, но вместо упоротых скинов будет большая надпись ERROR).
 - Контингент играет соответствующий, писклявые школьники, бабы которые играют в КС для привлечения внимания к себе да и "прастые пацаны с района". Небольшой процент нормальных игроков всё же встречается. Редко, но бывает.
 - Исходя из этого - агрессивное комьюнити (поставив спрей-обманку в удачном месте есть высокая вероятность что кучка пацанов в пабе сгорит и начнет спамить !voteban, также доставляют высокоинтеллектуальные беседы в голосовом чате и пр.).

В целом, иногда можно и поиграть вечерок-другой, ибо всяко лучше GO.

[b]Senelerin efsane oyunlarından birisi olan, takım tabanlı aksiyon oyunlarının en iyi örneklerinden birisi olan [url=https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/valve/list/8/]Counter-Strike[/url] serisinin en gözde oyunlarından birisidir kendisi. Gözümde yapımı en değerli kılan nokta, Valve'ın şaheser niteliğindeki oyun motoru olan Source'u kullandığı ilk Counter-Strike oyunu olduğundan biraz önce dediğim gibi gözümde yeri çok ayrıdır. Ayrıca çıkış yaptığı döneme göre gerçekten başarılı grafiklere ve efektlere sahip olması yapımın ne kadar özen gösterilerek yapıldığının somut bir örneğidir. Bahsetmeden geçersem ayıp edeceğim bir başka nokta oyunun fizik motoru zira oynanışından en fazla keyif aldığım Counter-Strike oyunu istisnasız Source'dur. Bombayı kurup üzerine varil atabileceğiniz, harita içerisinde neredeyse her öğe ile iletişime geçebileceğiniz harika bir oyun dizaynına sahip. Her ne kadar oyun içerisinde açabileceğiniz kasalar, kullanabileceğiniz harika tasarımlı silah skinleri olmasa da oynanış bakımından oldukça eğlenceli olduğunu rahatça söyleyebilirim. Eğer takım tabanlı çevrimiçi oyunları seviyorsanız veyahut [url=https://store.steampowered.com/publisher/valve/list/8/]Counter-Strike[/url] dünyasında eşsiz bir nostaljik deneyime hazırsanız kütüphanenize eklemenizi kesinlikle ama kesinlikle tavsiye ederim.

Daha fazla inceleme için;
https://store.steampowered.com/curator/28040015[/b]
